Easter Amazon deal slices price on powerful Ryzen 7 5700X CPU and 
motherboard bundle
text: Is this bundle deal worth the hype? PC Guide is reader-supported. When you buy through links on our site, we may earn an affiliate commission. Prices subject to change. Read More Last Updated on March 30, 2024 Building your own desktop PC can be really exciting, but also a bit intimidating if you’re new to it. There are so many different components to choose from and making sure they all work well together is crucial. That’s where this bundle deal from AMD and MSI comes in – it takes the guesswork out by pairing one of AMD’s latest powerful processors with a quality motherboard that’s an ideal match. Amazon has this bundle up for grabs at $379.99 right now, which is a nice $40 saving off the regular combined price of $419.99 for these two components purchased separately. With the 7% discount, you’re basically getting a free game or two along with your slick new AMD processor and motherboard combo. INLAND Micro Center AMD Ryzen 7 5700X 8-Core 16-Thread Best Deals This duo brings a ton of processing muscle and fully-loaded modern features to your new build. Here’s a closer look at what makes this pairing such a great value. On the CPU side, we’ve got AMD’s Ryzen 7 5700X – an 8-core, 16-thread beast. It’s basically like having 16 separate brain processors working together to demolish any task you throw its way. And with a max boost speed of 4.6GHz, it’s wicked fast too. But a powerful brain needs an equally capable body, and that’s where the MSI MAG X570S Tomahawk motherboard comes in. This bad boy is packed with all the latest goodies. It’s rocking WiFi 6 and Bluetooth 5.2 for awesome wireless speeds and connectivity. It’s got a bunch of USB ports to hook up all your gear. And it uses the speedy PCIe 4.0 standard for lightning-fast data zipping between your graphics card, storage drives, you name it. Now the cool part – both the processor and motherboard support overclocking out of the box. So if you’re feeling adventurous, you can easily push the Ryzen chip beyond its factory settings for even more explosive performance. The motherboard’s built tough to handle it. And you don’t even need to buy an aftermarket CPU cooler right away, because AMD bundles in their Wraith Prism RGB cooler. It’s got a slick color light show and does a solid job keeping the processor nice and chilled. As for memory, this motherboard is ready to roll with super-fast DDR4 RAM up to 3200MHz+. It’s got four memory slots, so you can load it up with plenty of high-speed system memory for intense multitasking. This AMD processor and motherboard bundle just makes building a powerful new desktop PC straightforward. The Ryzen 7 5700X gives you 8 cores and 16 threads of serious processing muscle for gaming, video editing, 3D work and multitasking. While not the flagship, it’s still an incredibly capable CPU. The real value is pairing it with MSI’s well-built X570S Tomahawk WiFi motherboard. This board has all the latest connectivity like WiFi 6, Bluetooth 5.2, USB ports, and PCIe 4.0. It’s a robust foundation from a trusted brand that’s optimized for AMD’s Ryzen chips. Having overclocking support, fast memory speeds, and even a decent RGB CPU cooler included elevates the package. And at the discounted $379 bundle price, you’re just getting a ton of performance for less than buying these two quality components separately.
